channel.title: Free HRT Kitchen
channel.description: Recent content on Free HRT Kitchen

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Contact us

We currently have two ways to get in contact with our group. If you do not have access to one of these ways, we apologize, and recommend finding someone who does. These ways were chosen to protect the folks providing resources as well as those receiving it.

Signal

The best way to get in contact with us is over Signal. Signal is a secure messaging app which keeps the identities of those using it secret and also protects the contents of the messages.

item.title: Our Mission
item.description:
Our mission

It is our belief that hormone therapy for trans folks is necessary for survival and well-being. At the same time, access to hormones is made complicated by the current state of the medical establishment and pharmaceutical industry. Despite these barriers to access, the hormone therapy itself is very cheap, as hormones are relatively common and simple compounds.

As such, our mission is: To provide free access to hormone therapy to any trans person who wants or needs it.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
About us

We are a small (for now) group of queer and trans folks living in the SF Bay Area. We started our group in early 2025 in response to the attacks on the lives of trans folks. Through research and our own experiences, we decided that providing every trans person with free access to hormones was doable. Since then, we have been working to expand our reach and accomplish our mission.

item.title: Resources
item.description:
Resources

The DIY HRT Directory provides fantastic resources for both Transmasc and Transfem folks who are looking to understand the different forms of HRT and to safely use them.

The North American Syringe Exchange Network (NASEN) provides a directory of needle exchange programs which can help folks access free needles for performing their hormone injections.

item.title: Support Us
item.description:
Support our work

Right now, we are looking for several forms of support:

Have extra hormone supplies? We will gladly take them and redistribute them to those in need. Contact us to find a way to meet.

Are you associated with an organization which interacts with trans folks in need? Contact us and we can figure out how to work together.

Want to directly fund our work? We currently accept cash donations. Contact us to find a way to meet.
